name: rexreplace
description: Smooth search & replace in files from CLI.
author: Mathias Rangel Wulff

scripts.test-minify: npm run build-minify && npm run test-cli && npm run test-js
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run test-cli && npm run test-js
scripts.build-minify: npm run build && npm run minify
scripts.minify: echo '#!/usr/bin/env node' > bin/rexreplace.cli.min.js && google-closure-compiler-js bin/rexreplace.cli.js >> bin/rexreplace.cli.min.js
scripts.test-cli: npm uninstall -g rexreplace && npm -g install ./ && npm run test-cli-only
scripts.prepublishOnly: git pull && npm run test-minify && npm run load-options
scripts.postpublish: git add --all && git commit -m v$(node -e 'console.log(require(`./package.json`).version)') && git tag v$(node -e 'console.log(require(`./package.json`).version)') && git push && git push --tag && (open https://github.com/mathiasrw/rexreplace/releases || 1)
scripts.test-format: yarn prettier --list-different || (echo 'Please correct file formatting using `npm run format` and try again.' && exit 1)
